# ACS (Antenna Control System)

> Satellite/Sun tracking antenna control system

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: Vue 3 + Quasar 2.x + TypeScript + Pinia
- Backend: Kotlin 1.9 + Spring Boot 3.x + WebFlux
- Algorithm: Orekit 13.0 (satellite), solarpositioning (sun)
- Communication: REST API, WebSocket, UDP (ICD)

## Project Structure

```
frontend/src/
├── components/     # Vue components
├── pages/          # Route pages (mode/ for mode pages)
├── stores/         # Pinia stores
├── services/       # API services
├── composables/    # Vue composition functions
└── types/          # TypeScript types

backend/src/main/kotlin/
├── controller/     # REST API endpoints
├── service/        # Business logic
├── algorithm/      # Calculation (satellite/sun tracking)
├── dto/            # Data transfer objects
└── model/          # Domain models
```

## Important Conventions

- Angle units: internal=radians, display=degrees
- Time: internal=UTC, display=local
- Train/Tilt: variable name=`train`, UI display=`Tilt`
- Orekit: requires initialization (orekit-data path)

## Modes

| Mode | Description |
|------|-------------|
| Standby | Idle mode |
| Step | Step movement |
| Slew | Slew movement |
| EphemerisDesignation | Satellite orbit tracking |
| PassSchedule | Pass schedule automation |
| SunTrack | Sun tracking |
